children.name: Product defects

Error: Modal description is incorrect.
Expected: Are you sure you want to delete your conversation with Bob? This will permanently delete all messages and attachments.
Actual: Are you sure you want to delete your conversation with Bob? New messages from Bob will start a new conversation.
Delete conversation from conversation list @android @high-risk @3-devices
